[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [blockRendering](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.md) &gt; [ConstantProvider](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.md)

## blockRendering.ConstantProvider class

An object that provides constants for rendering blocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ConstantProvider 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ConstantProvider` class.

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createBlockStyle\_(colour)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.createblockstyle__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create a block style object based on the given colour. |
|  [generateSecondaryColour\_(inputColour)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.generatesecondarycolour__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Generate a secondary colour from the passed in primary colour. |
|  [generateTertiaryColour\_(inputColour)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.generatetertiarycolour__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Generate a tertiary colour from the passed in primary colour. |
|  [getBlockStyle(blockStyleName)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.getblockstyle_1_method.md) |  | Gets the BlockStyle for the given block style name. |
|  [getCSS\_(selector)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.getcss__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get any renderer specific CSS to inject when the renderer is initialized. |
|  [injectCSS\_(tagName, selector)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.injectcss__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Inject renderer specific CSS into the page. |
|  [setComponentConstants\_(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.setcomponentconstants__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Set constants from a theme's component styles. |
|  [setDynamicProperties\_(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.setdynamicproperties__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Sets dynamic properties that depend on other values or theme properties. |
|  [setFontConstants\_(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.setfontconstants__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Set constants related to fonts. |
|  [validatedBlockStyle\_(blockStyle)](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.constantprovider_class.validatedblockstyle__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get a full block style object based on the input style object. Populate any missing values. |
